name: 6HEAD Perth
desc: 6HEAD is a world-class dining experience that celebrates some of the world’s most distinguished wine and beef. The restaurant is located in the heart of the city, offering a unique dining experience that is both elegant and relaxed. The restaurant is a celebration of the world’s best beef and wine, with a menu that showcases the finest cuts of beef from around the world, paired with an extensive wine list that features some of the world’s most prestigious wines. The restaurant is a place where guests can enjoy a world-class dining experience that is both elegant and relaxed, with a menu that is designed to showcase the best of what the world has to offer.
